description.en: Discover a home where the city’s pulse softens into the sea’s embrace. Baystar by Vida is a testament to branded marina-living that takes on a lyrical quality. Reflecting VIDA’s signature ethos—Baystar is an upscale, playful luxury abode that balances modern sophistication with a calm, soothing ambience. A sanctuary where dreams anchor, horizons become your canvas, and the soul of the sea lives at your doorstep. Baystar by Vida offers 1–4 bedroom waterfront apartments homes at Rashid Yachts & Marina with stunning views and VIDA’s signature lifestyle. Where elegant seafront living meets modern comfort.
A luxurious swimming pool for recreation and entertainment with stunning views

mapDescription.en: Baystar by Vida rises along Dubai’s shoreline with bold elegance and signature VIDA flair. Where the city meets the marina, green spaces, boutique retail, and striking architecture create a vibrant new rhythm of seafront living—crafted for tomorrow’s dreamers. Welcome to Rashid Yachts & Marina — a visionary haven along the Arabian Gulf, where daring design meets azure horizons. Sweeping marina vistas unfold alongside a promenade lined with curated retail and dining destinations, whilst yachts gently berth at your doorstep, moments become a celebration of opulent waterfront living. Every residence is brought to life with intricate detail and striking expression, offering a marina living experience beyond the ordinary. Rashid Yachts & Marina redefines Dubai’s seafront coastal legacy — a realm of fearless ambition and infinite discovery.
